alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 10 at 3:28PM MDT until May 10 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Fremont County in central Colorado... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 327 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Royal Gorge, or 25 miles northeast of Hayden Pass Burn Scar, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Fremont County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
